name: spotgen
author: Vegard Ã˜ye <vegard_oye@hotmail.com>
description: A tool for generating Spotify playlists programmatically. Convert websites to Spotify playlists, incorporate Last.fm listener data, and employ smart algorithms to reorder the tracks.

scripts.clean!: npm run reset && npm run clean
scripts.clean!!: npm run reset! && npm run clean
scripts.ds_store: find . -iname "*.DS_Store" -exec git rm {} \;; find . -iname "*er i konflikt*" -exec git rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.DS_Store" -exec rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.docx" -exec rm {} \;; find . -iname "*.log" -exec rm {} \;
scripts.build: npm run browser && npm run jsdoc
scripts.rebuild: npm run build && npm run http
scripts.retest: npm run clean! && npm install && npm test
scripts.dist: npm run build && npm run minify && cp -r doc dist && cp -r test dist
scripts.lint: npm run jshint && npm run standard && npm run markdownlint
scripts.jshint: jshint index.js lib/album.js lib/artist.js lib/auth.js lib/collection.js lib/generator.js lib/http.js lib/lastfm.js lib/playlist.js lib/parser.js lib/queue.js lib/scraper.js lib/similar.js lib/sort.js lib/spotify.js lib/top.js lib/track.js lib/util.js dist/web.js test/test.js
scripts.standard: standard index.js lib/album.js lib/artist.js lib/auth.js lib/collection.js lib/generator.js lib/http.js lib/lastfm.js lib/playlist.js lib/parser.js lib/queue.js lib/scraper.js lib/similar.js lib/sort.js lib/spotify.js lib/top.js lib/track.js lib/util.js dist/web.js test/test.js
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run tests
scripts.http: npm run start && npm run server
scripts.browser: browserify dist/web.js -i express -i preq -i xregexp -o dist/bundle.js && browserify test/test.js -i express -i preq -i xregexp -o test/bundle.js
scripts.web: npm run browser && npm run open
scripts.builddoc: npm run jsdoc && npm run doc
scripts.jsdoc: rm -rf doc && jsdoc -c .jsdocrc -d doc README.md index.js lib/album.js lib/artist.js lib/auth.js lib/collection.js lib/generator.js lib/http.js lib/lastfm.js lib/playlist.js lib/parser.js lib/queue.js lib/scraper.js lib/similar.js lib/sort.js lib/spotify.js lib/top.js lib/track.js lib/util.js
scripts.commit: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a -m "Updated `git status | sed -n '/modified:/ {s/^[[:space:]]*modified:[[:space:]]*//;s/\.txt$//;s/\.md$//;s/\.html$//;s/\/index$//;p;q;}'`"
scripts.amend: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend --no-edit
scripts.reword: git --no-pager status && git --no-pager diff && git commit -a --amend
scripts.reset!: npm run reset && npm run clear
scripts.push: git --no-pager status && git pull --rebase && git push
scripts.bump: npm run push && npm run tags && npm publish
scripts.patch: npm version patch && npm run bump
scripts.minor: npm version minor && npm run bump
scripts.major: npm version major && npm run bump
